definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Alter the pitch, pan, tempo, volumes etc.
sentences.chinese: 改变音高，声像，节奏，数量等。

sentences.english: Tone: Tones sre pitch variations, which are caused by the differing rates of vibration of the vocal cords.
sentences.chinese: 声调是由于声带振动的速率的不同而引起的音高变化。

sentences.english: For example, by measuring the basic pitch, you measure the density of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 例如，通过测量基本音高来测量宇宙的密度。

sentences.english: The pitch of a voice is also very important to women looking for a long-term partner.
sentences.chinese: 音高在女性寻找长期伴侣时也非常重要易唯口语网。

sentences.english: The second chapter refers to studies on mono-syllable tone from the two perspectives of pitch and duration.
sentences.chinese: 第二章从音高和时长两个角度研究南京方言单字调。

sentences.english: The pitch of a voice is also very important to women looking for a long-term partner.
sentences.chinese: 音高在女性寻找长期伴侣时也非常重要。

sentences.english: To give a correct pitch is the basic and key point to play bamboo flute.
sentences.chinese: 把竹笛的音高吹准，是演奏笛曲的基础与关键。

sentences.english: He keyed the piano up to a concert pitch.
sentences.chinese: 他把钢琴的音调调到了音乐会要求的音高标准。

sentences.english: But the relationship between absolute pitch and language cannot be the whole story.
sentences.chinese: 但音高辨别力和语言之间的关系不可能是其原因。

sentences.english: The seventh fret harmonics pitch should match the fundamental frequency of the open string notes.
sentences.chinese: 第七品泛音音高应与基本的空弦音一致。

sentences.english: Perhaps a genetic predisposition for absolute pitch is more common among Asian populations.
sentences.chinese: 也许音高辨别力的基因素因在亚洲人中更加普遍。

sentences.english: Great visual feed-back with semitone snap, and actual pitch indicator.
sentences.chinese: 伟大的视觉饲料回半音管理单元，和实际音高的指标。

sentences.english: A standard guitar sounds one octave below pitch as written in standard notation.
sentences.chinese: 一把标准吉他实际音高比谱面低一个八度。

sentences.english: In this manner, the angle of incidence can be changed to adjust the pitch trim.
sentences.chinese: 在这种方式，入射角是可以改变的调整音高修剪。

definition: names of the notes of a musical scale (e.g. C, D, E or do, re, mi)
tuning (stringed instrument)/(fig.) to make up one's mind
a note on a musical scale
part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
